data.title: #MUBB Claims BIG EAST Team Academic Excellence Award
data.meta_description: The BIG EAST Conference has announced the 22 teams that have been recognized with 2023-24 Team Academic Excellence Awards for compiling the highest collectiv...
data.text:
The BIG EAST Conference has announced the 22 teams that have been recognized with 2023-24 Team Academic Excellence Awards for compiling the highest collective grade-point averages in each conference sport.

The winners were chosen based on the 2023-24 grade-point average of each student-athlete who appeared on an institution's roster as of the last contest of the championship segment in each conference-sponsored sport.

Eleven schools had at least one team honored, with DePaul leading the way with five, while Creighton had the second most with four teams recognized.

2023-24 BIG EAST Team Academic Excellence Award Winners

Sport School GPA Baseball St. John's 3.460 Men's Basketball Marquette 3.353 Women's Basketball DePaul 3.529 Men's Cross Country Creighton 3.770 Women's Cross Country Creighton 3.780 Men's Indoor Track & Field Providence 3.592 Women's Indoor Track & Field Butler 3.722 Men's Outdoor Track & Field Creighton 3.770 Women's Outdoor Track & Field Creighton 3.780 Field Hockey Villanova 3.709 Men's Golf Georgetown 3.801 Women's Golf St. John's 3.855 Men's Lacrosse Denver 3.529 Women's Lacrosse Denver 3.707 Men's Soccer Seton Hall 3.529 Women's Soccer DePaul 3.764 Softball Seton Hall 3.721 Men's Swimming and Diving Georgetown 3.663 Women's Swimming and Diving Xavier 3.676 Men's Tennis DePaul 3.812 Women's Tennis DePaul 3.896 Volleyball DePaul 3.755
